title: JAYALALITHA WITHDRAWS HER PARTY DELEGATE FROM TEAM OF MPS TO SRI LANKA IN PROTEST
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana Tamil Nadu’s Chief Minister and and General Secretary  of the AIADMK Jayalalitha Jeyaram said her party would boycott the 15 member parliamentary delegation scheduled to visit Sri Lanka on a fact finding mission scheduled April 16 arguing it may prove an eyewash….
